mapper.select: SELECT up.id, ui.username, up.gender, up.height, up.weight, up.age, up.goal FROM user_profile up JOIN user_info ui ON up.id = ui.id WHERE up.id = #{id}

select count(*) as count, pbp.body_part as bodyPart from post left join post_body_part pbp on post.id=pbp.post_id where writer_id='admin2' or id in (select fp.post_id as post_id from favorite_post fp where fp.user_id='admin2') group by bodyPart;
